Exporting a File List on Amazon S3

This task will provide a list of files in XML format from a specified bucket.

Settings

Bucket

Required The name of the storage bucket to list files from.

Connection

Required The Amazon S3 Connection to use.

Folder

Optional The folder to list files in. Leave blank to list all files in the selected bucket.

Zynk Settings

See Common Task Settings

Examples

Sample output file showing the file ‘customers.xml’:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
    <ArrayOfListEntry>
    <ListEntry>
    	<Name>customers.xml</Name>
    	<ETag>"91216dfc27fd460e8ac86ac4f27ed029"</ETag>
    	<LastModified>2015-05-21T09:02:07</LastModified>
    	<Owner>
    		<Id>2ec66d54fb6dcf0819b44f515e43a0604b55872a11b399648f36aba0d98bb5e0</Id>
    		<DisplayName>zynksoftware</DisplayName>
    	</Owner>
    	<Size>835</Size>
    	<StorageClass>
    		<Value>STANDARD</Value>
    	</StorageClass>
    </ListEntry>
    </ArrayOfListEntry>
